ee:transform.doc:name: save incoming dates, batch size and offset

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { start_date: attributes.queryParams.start_date, end_date : attributes.queryParams.end_date, batch_size: p('batch-size'), offset: attributes.queryParams.offset default 0 }

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output text/plain --- "SELECT attribute1,attribute2,acct_segment1,acct_segment2,acct_segment3,acct_segment4,acct_segment5, user_je_source_name,pgm_name,date_created,accounting_date,entered_dr_amount,entered_cr_amount from ( SELECT NVL(attribute1,0) as attribute1 ,NVL(attribute2,0) as attribute2 , NVL(acct_segment1,0) as acct_segment1 , NVL(acct_segment2,0) as acct_segment2 , NVL(acct_segment3,0) as acct_segment3 , NVL(acct_segment4,0) as acct_segment4 , NVL(acct_segment5,0) as acct_segment5 , user_je_source_name , NVL(pgm_name,' ') as pgm_name , to_char(date_created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as date_created , to_char(accounting_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as accounting_date , round(entered_dr_amount,2) as entered_dr_amount , round(entered_cr_amount,2) as entered_cr_amount FROM krk_custom.stg_fif_gl_data WHERE to_char(date_created,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN " ++ vars.varIncomingData.start_date ++ " AND " ++ vars.varIncomingData.start_date ++ "AND NOT(Round(ENTERED_DR_AMOUNT,2) = 0 AND ROUND(ENTERED_CR_AMOUNT,2) = 0) AND ACCT_SEGMENT3 <> 50000 OFFSET "++ vars.varIncomingData.offset ++ " ROWS FETCH NEXT "++ vars.varIncomingData.batch_size ++ " ROWS ONLY )"

db:select.doc:name: Select : See if you can pass SQL on on connector itself.

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { count: sizeOf(payload), has_more_records : true, next_url : "/pagination/oracle?start_date="++ vars.varIncomingData.start_date ++"&end_date=" ++ vars.varIncomingData.end_date ++"&offset="++ sum ([vars.varIncomingData.offset,vars.varIncomingData.batch_size]), data : payload }
